messages.title: Real green action
messages.content: I'm backing the 10:10 campaign to cut emissions by 10% by the end of 2010. Lib Dems in Parliament wanted the UK Government to sign up too, but Labour said no.

messages.title: Student debt
messages.content: The Lib Dems have got it right on student finance - it's completely wrong that people are graduating in thousands of pounds of debt. We need to scrap tuition fees now! - AMY S

messages.title: Money Worries
messages.content: Carol Woods knows that many students here are in just as much financial trouble as I am, struggling to pay for the cost of heating, food, textbooks! Carol's working to help students. - MICHAEL

messages.title: A real change
messages.content: We need to send Carol Woods to Parliament so she can fight for real change - not the phoney change we will get from Labour and the Tories. We need to change the voting system, so we have fair votes and not safe seats for life! Only the Lib Dems will fix this. - ROBBIE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting the 10:10 campaign to cut emissions by 10% by the end of 2010, advocating for governmental commitment to climate action.
Opinion on the need to abolish tuition fees and address the issue of student debt burden.
Advocacy for a change in the voting system to ensure fairer representation and the elimination of safe seats.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Carol Woods can beat Labour in Durham. If you want to beat Labour, it'd be a real mistake to vote Conservative here.

issues.environment: Supporting the 10:10 campaign to cut emissions by 10% by the end of 2010.
issues.governance: Advocacy for a change in the voting system to ensure fairer representation.

endorsements.endorsement: The Lib Dems have got it right on student finance - it's completely wrong that people are graduating in thousands of pounds of debt.
Carol Woods knows that many students here are in just as much financial trouble as I am.
We need to send Carol Woods to Parliament so she can fight for real change.
Carol Woods has the best chance of beating Labour here.

images.caption: Liberal Youth supports Carol Woods standing up for Durham students.
